issue.title: [Packaging] License check fails with Apache RAT 0.13
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-5521](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-5521). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
We currently use version 0.12. With 0.13 I get:
```java

NOT APPROVED: js/src/fb/File.ts (xx/js/src/fb/File.ts): false
NOT APPROVED: js/src/fb/Message.ts (xx/js/src/fb/Message.ts): false
NOT APPROVED: js/src/fb/Schema.ts (xx/js/src/fb/Schema.ts): false
NOT APPROVED: js/test/inference/column.ts (xx/js/test/inference/column.ts): false
NOT APPROVED: js/test/inference/nested.ts (xx/js/test/inference/nested.ts): false
NOT APPROVED: js/test/inference/visitor/get.ts (xx/js/test/inference/visitor/get.ts): false
6 unapproved licences. Check rat report: rat.txt
```

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-5521?focusedCommentId=16857746) by Uwe Korn (uwe):*
Issue resolved by pull request 4486
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/4486>
